## Bitmap.SetResolution method

为此设置分辨率Bitmap.

```csharp
public void SetResolution(float xDpi, float yDpi)
```

| 范围 | 类型 | 描述 |
| --- | --- | --- |
| xDpi | Single | 水平分辨率（以每英寸点数为单位）Bitmap. |
| yDpi | Single | 垂直分辨率（以每英寸点数为单位）Bitmap. |
